languages.text: "Винтерскейл, о котором я слышал{mf||а}, не бросил бы свои миры на растерзание Чорде, чтобы предаться бездумной охоте".

traits.locale_text: "Винтерскейл, о котором я слышал{mf||а}, не бросил бы свои миры на растерзание Чорде, чтобы предаться бездумной охоте".

languages.text: "The Winterscale I have heard of would have never thrown his worlds to Chorda only to indulge in mindless hunting."
languages.original_text: "Винтерскейл, о котором я слышал{mf||а}, не бросил бы свои миры на растерзание Чорде, чтобы предаться бездумной охоте".

traits.locale_text: "The Winterscale I heard of would have never thrown his worlds to the Chorda, just for mindlessly indulging in the hunts."
"The Winterscale I heard of would have never thrown his worlds to the Chorda, just for mindlessly indulging in the hunts."
"The Winterscale I heard of would have never thrown his worlds to the Chorda, just for mindlessly indulging in the hunts."
"The Winterscale I heard of would have never thrown his worlds to the Chorda, just for mindlessly indulging in the hunts."
"The Winterscale I have heard of would have never thrown his worlds to Chorda only to indulge in mindless hunting."
"The Winterscale I have heard of would have never thrown his worlds to Chorda only to indulge in mindless hunting."

languages.text: «El Winterscale del que yo había oído hablar nunca habría entregado sus mundos a los Chorda solo para recrearse en sus cacerías».
languages.original_text: "The Winterscale I have heard of would have never thrown his worlds to Chorda only to indulge in mindless hunting."

traits.locale_text: «El Winterscale del que yo había oído hablar nunca habría permitido que sus mundos cayesen en manos de los Chorda para recrearse impulsivamente en sus cacerías».

languages.text: “我听说的那位温特斯凯尔，可不会因为盲目沉迷于狩猎，而把他的世界拱手让给库尔达。
languages.original_text: "The Winterscale I have heard of would have never thrown his worlds to Chorda only to indulge in mindless hunting."

traits.locale_text: “我听说的那位温特斯凯尔，可不会因为沉迷于狩猎，而把他的世界拱手让给库尔达。

languages.text: « Le Winterscale dont on m'a tant parlé n'aurait jamais abandonné ses mondes à Chorda pour une simple partie de chasse. »
languages.original_text: "The Winterscale I have heard of would have never thrown his worlds to Chorda only to indulge in mindless hunting."

traits.locale_text: « Le Winterscale dont on m'a tant parlé n'aurait jamais abandonné ses mondes à Chorda pour une simple partie de chasse. »

languages.text: 「私の聞いていたウィンタースケールは、己の世界をチョーダに投げ出して、狩りに夢中になるようなことなどしなかったはずだ」
languages.original_text: "The Winterscale I have heard of would have never thrown his worlds to Chorda only to indulge in mindless hunting."

traits.locale_text: 「私が噂に聞いたウィンタースケールは、ただ無心に狩りにふけって、チョーダ家に惑星を明け渡しは、しなかったはずだ」

languages.text: "Der Winterzunder, von dem ich gehört habe, hätte seine Welten nie den Chordas ausgeliefert, um einer geistlosen Jagd zu frönen."
languages.original_text: "The Winterscale I have heard of would have never thrown his worlds to Chorda only to indulge in mindless hunting."

traits.locale_text: "Der Winterzunder, von dem ich gehört habe, hätte seine Welten nie den Chordas geschenkt, nur um wie berauscht auf die Jagd zu gehen."
